member.name: T:JsonFx.Compilation.ResourceCodeProvider
member.summary: Base class for all build-time resource compaction implementations.
member.remarks:
This was implemented as a CodeProvider rather than a BuildProvider in order to gain access to the CompilerResults object. This enables a custom compiler to correctly report its errors in the Visual Studio Error List. Double clicking these errors takes the user to the actual source at the point where the error occurred.
Unfortunately, in Web Application Projects (WAP) the compilation happens outside of Visual Studio leaving little or no trace of these errors. The output of the resource will now also show an error listing.
